comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: "2nd Lieutenant Isaac Althorp Ridgway came to Australia at age 24. 'He was Master of Science and an Associate Member Institute Civil Engineers. ... When war broke out he was Lighthouse Engineer of Queensland.' Parents reside Lymm, Cheshire, England. "Mortally wounded in the advance on Krithia, 8th May. Died aboard Hospital ship four days later [18 days after this photograph was taken] and was buried at sea." (more) – www.anzacs.org/pages/AOridgway.html
